steps.1: Pull two pieces of bread out onto a plate
steps.2: With a knife or spatula, spread the peanut butter onto on slice of bread.
steps.3: With a knife or spatula, spread the jelly onto the other slide of bread.
steps.4: Put both slices of bread together, mashing the peanut butter and jelly together between them.
steps.5: OPTIONAL: Slice the sandwich in half diagonally and share with a friend
